entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Chetwynd
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 16 near Chetwynd. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 except minus 16 near Chetwynd. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15 except minus 11 near Chetwynd.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15 except minus 11 near Chetwynd. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 except minus 16 near Chetwynd.
